title: The Future of Hitman - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.29.21
description:
Greg and freelance critic Giancarlo Valdes talk about Hitman's future and 343's big ol' #HaloInfinite blog post, a PSVR patent, and more! 

Follow Giancarlo https://twitter.com/_boogs

00:00:00 - Start
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
Tomorrow is Kinda Funny’s 12-hour stream! 10-10
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack!
The Roper Report   -
00:07:12 - The Future of Hitman, Kirk McKeand @ THE GAMER
00:14:30 - HALO: Inside Infinite Report
00:28:45 - Yakuza Creator Changes Roles, Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:33:45 - Epic Games Store Year in Review
00:36:20 - Interesting PSVR Patent, Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:40:35 -  Ad
00:41:45 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:46:00- Why can we not have nice things? - Frankfurtter
00:52:50  - If they get people to come back to this game, what will they spend money on? Nameplates?  - Thwip
00:57:45 - Squad Up:Dave Chanda (Xbox) - dmoney1523
00:58:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Tim
Tuesday: Greg and Gary
Wednesday: Blessing and Imran
Thursday: Greg and Tim
Friday: Greg and Laura Kate Dale
